https://tmrev.io/movie/294832-Car Washers 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/q1nNNW38SJ1kAKa6ZURGBBDn55E.jpg Kyiv in the nineties, tainted by a serious economic collapse and rising crime. A group of kids boost the family budget by washing cars at a gas station whose proprietors make a living in a rather dodgy way. The story is narrated by the 13-year-old protagonist, who eventually discovers how much this society has affected him. Car Washers
